CustomField.formula:
IF ( NOT(Is_Tariff_Condition__c) && NOT(Is_FlatPrice_Condition__c) && (Index__c = 'Index2') , - YTD_Nego__c / Contract__r.Total_TO__c ,
IF ( NOT(Is_Tariff_Condition__c) && Is_FlatPrice_Condition__c && (Index__c = 'Index1') , Index_perc__c * (1-Contract__r.Index2_perc__c-Contract__r.Index3_perc__c - Contract__r.Index4_perc__c) ,
NULL
))
CustomField.label: FlatPrice Rate Correction
